Tonga eruption’s unprecedented water vapour rapidly depleted ozone layer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tonga-eruptions-unprecedented-water-vapour-rapidly-depleted-ozone-layer/DN6JNRM54VFD3IDTN7CU3N5IBA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tonga-eruptions-unprecedented-water-vapour-rapidly-depleted-ozone-layer/DN6JNRM54VFD3IDTN7CU3N5IBA/ Jamie MortonNew findings describe another remarkable observation from last year's monster eruption. Thu, 19 Oct 2023 18:00:00 +0000 Last year’s gargantuan Tonga eruption launched an unprecedented amount of water vapour into the sky – depleting about 5 per cent of the ozone layer in some regions within just a week. Photo / JMA
